programme.title: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home.

programme.title: The National Tree
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A man and his son embark on a road trip to transport a Christmas tree.

programme.title: Welcome to Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. The town of Christmas tries to convince a developer to build a ski resort.

programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Hand carved Santa figurines help inspire a town that needs Christmas cheer.

programme.title: Finding Father Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Christmas for Miranda is a painful reminder of the family she never had.

programme.title: Christmas in Conway
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A man plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard for his ailing wife.

programme.title: Lucky Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Holly learns her winning lottery ticket is in her stolen car.

programme.title: Miss Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A letter from a young boy sends an official tree finder to a small town.

programme.title: The Christmas Parade
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Haley, finds a renewed Christmas spirit and unexpected love.

programme.title: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home.

programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Hand carved Santa figurines help inspire a town that needs Christmas cheer.

programme.title: Window Wonderland
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Sloan Van Doren is hoping to take over the head window designer spot.

programme.title: A Family Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Amber spends the holidays with her Aunt Dora and helps plan a Christmas Concert.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. An upscale, urban family gets stranded in a remote lumber town before Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Belinda and her ex are forced to team up for the towns Christmas Scavenger Hunt.

programme.title: In Love and War
programme.desc: James Woods stars in this biographical portrait of war hero and future Ross Perot running mate, James Stockdale--a naval pilot held as a POW by the Vietnamese for over eight years.

programme.title: The Bad Bunch
programme.desc: A white war veteran goes to Watts in order to deliver a letter from his friend, who died in Vietnam. When he arrives, he encounters trouble from all sides.

programme.title: M.I.A. A Greater Evil
programme.desc: When a group of American college students lose their way on a voyage to find gold in a Vietnamese jungle, haunting echoes of the Vietnam War threaten to claim them as victims.

programme.title: William Kelly's War
programme.desc: Two Australian brothers decide to join the service during the Great War. Billy proves himself to be an outstanding sniper, earning him honorable recognition through many of the war's great battles.

programme.title: Yesterday's Target
programme.desc: Telekinetic Paul Harper is stuck thirty years in the past. He runs from a group of agents who are trying to kill him, while also locating and helping others in similar predicaments.

programme.title: The Trials of Rosie O'Neill
programme.desc: Rosie struggles to defend her client, who is on trial for accidentally killing her drug-addicted daughter. Meanwhile, Kim's increasing need to talk with Rosie strains their relationship.

programme.title: The Trials of Rosie O'Neill
programme.desc: Rosie's newest client is is a mentally-disturbed woman who is on trial for assaulting her case worker--an "assault" which even the case worker claims was an accident.

programme.title: The Trials of Rosie O'Neill
programme.desc: At a dinner honoring her late father, Rosie finds out that he was not the perfect man she thought he was. Meanwhile, Kim tags along with Rosie to her office and gets a crash course in the law.

programme.title: The Trials of Rosie O'Neill
programme.desc: Rosie attends her high school reunion where she encounters some old friends, including Tobey (Carol King) and Vicki (Tyne Daly). However, their relationships have changed considerably since then.

programme.title: The Trials of Rosie O'Neill
programme.desc: Rosie struggles with her latest case when her client is on trial for kidnapping her own foster son. On top of that, her other client (Ed Asner) is a gruff former cop who hates public defenders.

programme.title: Marilyn and Me
programme.desc: After learning of her death, Robert Slatzer recounts the story of meeting and immediately hitting it off with Norma Jean Baker as she navigated through the early stages of her acting career.

programme.title: Fire in the Dark
programme.desc: A poignant account of a woman struggling to age with dignity and composure. Emily is determined not to have to rely on her two children, but is eventually forced to move in after a serious fall.

programme.title: Your Mother Wears Combat Boots
programme.desc: When her son quits college to become an Army Ranger, the only way his mom can stop him is to enlist herself. They strike a deal: if she completes basic training, he'll return to college.

programme.title: Children of the Bride
programme.desc: Middle-aged Margret Becker becomes engaged to a man who's only two years older than her oldest child. She must learn to deal with the doubts faced by each of her four children concerning her fianc?.

programme.title: Backfield In Motion
programme.desc: Nancy Seavers and her teenage son Tim have moved to a small town where football reigns supreme. When Tim joins the junior-varsity team, Nancy organizes a mothers vs. sons football game.

programme.title: Mother of the Bride
programme.desc: Margaret Becker Hix deals with the upcoming wedding of her daughter, another daughter's romance with a motorcycle enthusiast, and a surprise appearance by her ex-husband.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Days Of Wrath
programme.desc: A hard, cold, ruthless killer teaches a young man the rules of a life dedicated to violence and based on the speed of a gun. The young man later denies that lifestyle and the two stalk each other throughout the town in a climactic duel to the death.

programme.title: Rogue Male
programme.desc: TV movie finds 30s British aristocrat OToole plotting to assassinate Hitler. When his plan fails, hes on the run from both the Gestapo and the British police.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Days Of Wrath
programme.desc: A hard, cold, ruthless killer teaches a young man the rules of a life dedicated to violence and based on the speed of a gun. The young man later denies that lifestyle and the two stalk each other throughout the town in a climactic duel to the death.

programme.title: Compaeros
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a dual role as twins separated at birth who grow up and cross paths. Two brothers, one becomes a famous conductor and pianist in New York, another becomes a racecar driver and bodyguard in Hong Kong. When the conductor travels to Hong Kong to give a concert, the twins get caught up in each other's business, about which they are anything but experts.

programme.title: Professionals for a Massacre
programme.desc: Caught selling stolen guns, three Confederate soldiers get a reprieve from the firing squad, provided they go into Mexico on a mission to recover stolen gold belonging to the Confederacy.

programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.
